name: Karachi Gangesters Vs Rangers
description:
Karachi, The city of lights, the ex-capital of Pakistan is under threat from different gangs, these gangs operate underground, kill and loot innocents citizens of city. they collect money my extortion, kidnapping and land grabbing etc. they attack and kill any one who does not comply.
Now that Rangers are there to clean the city, arresting and killing these gangsters. Be the part of fearless rangers team, find and kill them where you find them.
Bring the deadly gangsters to justice.

-> Karachi city environment
-> Gangsters rule there
-> Gangs attack and kill people
-> Rangers team to kill the gangsters
-> Be the lone Ranger hero

This game supports ads.
